programme.sub-title: More to Love: Proceed With Caution

programme.title: The Little Couple
programme.desc: The Klein family settles into life at their new house but has a lot of decisions to make about renovations. They shop for lighting and plumbing fixtures and test some paint colors with the kids. Then, it's time for some barbecue and pool fun.

programme.title: The Little Couple
programme.sub-title: I'm Gonna Catch the Biggest Fish
programme.desc: It's family vacation time, so the Klein's, Jen's parents and aunt Barbara head up the Florida coast to visit Jen's sweet great uncle Ray. Their getaway leads to learning about sea turtle rescue, fishing and celebrating uncle Ray's 87th birthday.

programme.title: Say Yes to the Dress: Atlanta
programme.desc: Returning raucous bride Stacy is back again to find another dress to reflect her motorcycle-chic style. Bride Jessica wants a modern dress for her beach wedding but her mother-in-law is set on tradition.

programme.title: Say Yes to the Dress: Atlanta
programme.sub-title: Two Montes are Better Than None
programme.desc: Bride Katherine wants a vintage dress she can wear with cowboy boots, but her BFF is pushing for a glamorous Parisian-inspired gown. Bride Dawn's son is a mini-fashionista who gives Monte a run for his money as he seeks out the perfect dress for his mom.

programme.title: Say Yes to the Dress: Atlanta
programme.desc: Lori and Monte hit the road with a pop-up salon in tow to surprise a very special bride who is getting married in just two days. Due to a recent tragedy, bride Anna has not taken the time to find a dress, but Team BBL is certain they can save the day.

programme.title: Say Yes to the Dress: Atlanta
programme.desc: Lori's son is getting married. Being mother of the groom and taking a back seat is anything but easy for this queen of bridal. Lori enlists Monte's help to plan the perfect wedding for Cory and Becca, ensuring the ultimate dream wedding for everyone.

programme.title: Say Yes to the Dress: Atlanta
programme.sub-title: A Little Sparkle Goes a Long Way
programme.desc: YouTube sensation and bride BFFTaylor won't feel satisfied with her dress until her mom cries. Olympian bride Kellie Wells comes in tow with Team Conservative and Team Sexy, and she must please them both or risk leaving empty-handed.

programme.title: Say Yes to the Dress
programme.desc: Monisha has come looking for a dress for her three wedding ceremonies. Mary has a budget of thirty thousand dollars to buy two dresses.

programme.title: Say Yes to the Dress
programme.desc: Jacqueline wastes no time explaining that she would like two different style dresses for her wedding.

programme.title: Say Yes to the Dress
programme.sub-title: We're Going to Say 'I Do' Underwater!
programme.desc: Omarosa of 'The Apprentice' is determined to find a colourful, dramatic gown for her big day. Jet-setting bride Valerie wants a dress fit for her lavish Ibiza wedding. Randy rescues bride Magaly who needs a dress for her underwater ceremony!

programme.title: Say Yes to the Dress
programme.desc: Randy's day is nonstop as he assists brides and auditions models for his runway show. Bride Emanuela wants a sexy ball gown and she's not afraid to throw her dad's budget out the window. Marlena is finally dress shopping for a wedding years in the making.

programme.title: Say Yes to the Dress
programme.sub-title: A Gown to Match My Black Heart
programme.desc: Feisty Camila's desire to buy a black dress may push her equally fiery mother over the edge. After years working as Pnina Tornai's right-hand woman, it's Ally's turn to be the bride.

programme.title: Dr. Pimple Popper
programme.desc: Terry's nose growth has prevented him from meeting his grandkids. Remi has alligator-like skin and is not used to taking care of herself. Austin has an embarrassing birthmark right next to his eyelid. Mary Jo has a throbbing bump on her neck.

programme.title: Dr. Pimple Popper
programme.desc: Dr. Lee is tasked with helping Reginald remove a large growth on his head. Then, Che'RE has a prominent bump on her place and Juan has boils on the back of his neck.

programme.title: Dr. Pimple Popper
programme.desc: Corey is a drag queen and has a bump dangling from his booty. Adam has a semi-circle of about a dozen cysts on his head that he covers with a hat. Virginia has large growths on both of her upper arms that make it difficult to travel in her RV.

programme.title: Dr. Pimple Popper
programme.desc: April is covered in bumps that have disfigured her arms. Genner has flown all the way from the Philippines to have Dr. Lee help with his bumpy nose. Chris suffers from psoriasis that nearly covers his body and a bump on his head.

programme.title: Dr. Mercy
programme.desc: Joseph's neck lipoma gets in the way of everything he does. Rachel's condition gives her a full beard that she shaves daily. Summer has seven cysts, including one she calls her 'unicorn horn.'.

programme.title: Dr. Mercy
programme.desc: Tiffany has a rare condition that has left her in so much pain, she's couch bound. Brad's face is covered in nodules from a condition that affects less than one in a million people. Lydia's life is majorly impacted by her excessive sweating.

programme.title: My Big Fat Fabulous Life
programme.desc: While on a painful break with the French man, Whitney grapples with her own jealousy after hearing Chase's happy news. The French man finally reaches out, but he may decide his privacy is more important than a romance with her.

programme.desc: Ethan returns from his mysterious road trip and shares important news with Olivia. Micah gets a wakeup call from his agent in Atlanta. Moriah shops with Kim and Max's mom for outfits for her upcoming gig but struggles to be honest with Kim.

programme.title: Say Yes to the Dress: UK

programme.title: The Family Chantel
programme.desc: Chantel's suspicions about Royal's relationship with Angenette grow after talking to Winter and River. As Pedro plans a trip to NYC, Chantel gets big news about her graduation. Sibling secrets come out when tempers flare during a holiday photo shoot.

programme.title: The Family Chantel

programme.title: The Family Chantel

programme.title: The Family Chantel
programme.desc: A shocking secret about Royal and Angenette's relationship surfaces just as the family heads to the Philippines for their wedding. Meanwhile, in the Dominican Republic, Nicole braces herself for Lidia's reaction when her new boyfriend comes to visit.

programme.title: The Family Chantel

programme.title: The Family Chantel

programme.title: The Family Chantel

programme.title: Treehouse Masters

programme.title: Rising Tide

programme.desc: Explore the consequences families face in the Marshall Islands, Fiji, and the Netherlands, as rising sea tides ruin fertile land and drinking water. Discover solutions to counter the current and future threats of this climate issue.

programme.title: Catalyst

programme.title: Tribes, Predators, and Me
programme.sub-title: Shark People of the South Pacific

programme.title: Earth: The Nature of Our Planet

programme.title: Hope for Wildlife

programme.title: America: Over the Edge

programme.title: A Park for All Seasons
programme.desc: Grasslands National Park sits on Canada's border between Saskatchewan and Montana. Two separate blocks, one east and one west, protect the North American mixed grass prairie, one of the most threatened ecosystems in North America.

programme.title: A Park for All Seasons
programme.desc: Point Pelee is the second smallest national park in Canada. While Point Pelee may be small, its reputation among bird watchers is gigantic. About four hours from Toronto and an hour from Windsor, millions of people are right at its doorstep.

programme.title: Canada: Over the Edge
programme.desc: From the small community of Tuktoyaktuk we begin an aerial journey southwest along the MacKenzie River Delta following the winter ice road ending in Inuvik, the transportation and cultural hub of the region.

programme.title: Wonders of Life
programme.desc: Brian travels around Australia to explore the physics of the size of life, beginning with the largest organisms on our planet right down to the smallest organisms. Size shapes life in many ways; it even decides the amount of years you get to enjoy it.

programme.title: Hope for Wildlife
programme.desc: Endangered bats need Hope's help but helping them means taking unusual steps. Hope's deer release gets off to a bumpy start.

programme.title: American Monster
programme.desc: When a good-looking, successful businessman meets an aspiring actress, she appears to be the perfect match. But the honeymoon doesn't last long. The relationship takes a turn...a deadly turn.

programme.title: Evil Lives Here
programme.desc: Jeanne Avsenew and her young son Peter were close, but as Peter matured, his obsession with death grew. The day Jeanne finds a bullet with her name scrawled on it, she realizes her son wants her dead, and Jeanne must take drastic measures to keep safe.

programme.title: Signs of a Psychopath
programme.sub-title: I'm Not the Monster I Was
programme.desc: An unapologetic 14-year-old boy confesses to the murder of his best friend. Twelve years later, he's back in court with chance at a reduced sentence.

programme.title: Signs of a Psychopath
programme.desc: A charming 20-year-old wants to help authorities with a murder investigation. He claims to have met one of the three victims and says he has no knowledge of the crime, but detectives suspect otherwise.

programme.title: The Murder Tapes
programme.desc: Kiana Marshall, her brother Corey, and their friend Alexis are murdered. Now, bodycam and CCTV capture the hunt for their insane killer. Twisted tales lead detectives on a wild goose chase, but the killers are revealed and must face the consequences.

programme.title: American Monster
programme.desc: In the summer of 2014, a peaceful community in Hartford, WI is shaken to its core when a local teenager is found dead, the victim of a brutal murder, and the second victim in two days. The community must recognize that a killer lives among them.

programme.title: American Monster
programme.desc: A monster stalks the summer streets of Phoenix in 2005. With never-before-seen footage, we get a glimpse into the killer's life and how he's able to hide in plain sight. Can police catch him before he strikes again?

programme.title: American Monster
programme.desc: When a good-looking, successful businessman meets an aspiring actress, she appears to be the perfect match. But the honeymoon doesn't last long. The relationship takes a turn...a deadly turn.

programme.title: People Magazine Investigates
programme.desc: A quiet rural town is rocked when two middle-school girls go on a hike and are later found murdered. But when police discover one of the girls may have recorded her killer with her cellphone, the race is on to find the mysterious man.

programme.title: People Magazine Investigates
programme.desc: A college student working as a radio station intern far from home is murdered, launching a long and frustrating investigation that leaves family and police on the brink of hopelessness until forensic genealogy leads to a man on the run for decades.

programme.title: People Magazine Investigates
programme.desc: A woman is murdered the same night she's supposed to go out with rising star, Ashton Kutcher. Police believe the clues point to a serial killer.

programme.title: Evil Lives Here
programme.desc: Jamie Clark had already been twice unlucky in love, so when she met Anthony Lord she thought the third time would be the charm. But by the time she realized what perverted plans he had for her, she was already trapped.

programme.title: Evil Lives Here
programme.desc: When Lori McLeod fell for a man claiming to be an FBI agent, she felt certain that she would always be safe. Now, as the end of her life draws near, Lori is determined to ensure that the murderer who betrayed her family never becomes a free man.

programme.title: Evil Lives Here
programme.desc: When Robin Doll was rescued from her mother's violence and went to live with her father, she thought she had cheated death. She had no way of knowing that the man she looked to as her savior was hiding something even worse.

programme.title: Web of Lies
programme.desc: When a single mom finds her dream man online, she can't believe her luck. But her quest to meet him soon turns into every mother's worst nightmare. As police scramble to avert tragedy, they discover the most elaborate web of lies they've ever seen.

programme.title: Web of Lies
programme.desc: After a teenage house party spirals out of control, a shocking photo goes viral around the local schools. A vicious campaign of cyber bullying ensues that drives an innocent girl to take desperate action.

programme.title: Web of Lies
programme.desc: When a young mother of three plummets into depression, she turns to the internet to find comfort. What she discovers is a virtual world of fetishes and fantasies, where seemingly helpful hands hide the darkest of intentions.

programme.title: House of Horrors: Kidnapped
programme.desc: Kristen Baumer moves into her freshman dorm not far from home in Newark, DE. As the year comes to an end, she goes to a party with her girlfriends. Fun quickly turns to terror when her innocence is stolen by a man who haunts her until senior year.

programme.title: House of Horrors: Kidnapped
programme.desc: Newly engaged Nikki Ansley starts work at a convenient store to purchase her fiancé's wedding ring. On her first day, two masked gunmen enter the store and kidnap her and two of her friends. After a night of terror, Nikki's life is changed forever.

programme.title: House of Horrors: Kidnapped
programme.desc: Teka Adams was starting to turn her life around. She's thrilled when, at 9 months pregnant, she gets a call from a woman claiming to be a caseworker offering baby supplies. But Teka soon learns that the woman has something much more horrifying in mind.

programme.title: House of Horrors: Kidnapped
programme.desc: When successful Miami businessman Marc Schiller is ambushed by a gang of thugs in broad daylight, his nightmare is just beginning. Blindfolded and bound, Marc learns that the men hell-bent on killing him have a special kind of torture in store for him.

programme.title: House of Horrors: Kidnapped
programme.desc: Alicia Kozakiewicz was a typical 13-year old who made friends in chat rooms. But when she agreed to meet Scott Tyree in person, she had no idea he was a 38-year-old sadistic pedophile.

programme.title: House of Horrors: Kidnapped
programme.desc: Cynthia Vigil is a street-smart teen from Albuquerque… But a fateful meeting ends with Cynthia in chains and forced into the horrifying world of the Toy Box Killer – a madman who, along with his girlfriend, subjects Cynthia to a world of torture and fear.

programme.title: House of Horrors: Kidnapped
programme.desc: Peter Brandt could never have predicted the dark secrets he would uncover when he invited a brilliant contractor into his home. After a vicious attack, Peter must manipulate the madman threatening his life into setting him free.

programme.title: House of Horrors: Kidnapped
programme.desc: When Karen Kummerer's jilted ex-boyfriend takes her hostage on a terrifying, multi-state road trip, there is little hope for rescuing her alive. But Karen has a daring plan in her back pocket to keep the cops hot on their trail.

programme.title: House of Horrors: Kidnapped
programme.desc: Best friends Brandi and Liz are two small town teens who were taught to help others in need. So when a young man asks them for a ride to his house, they decide to oblige. But they soon discover the man intends for this to ride to be their last.

programme.title: House of Horrors: Kidnapped
programme.desc: Sam and Suzzane Peebles were headed home after a long road trip in Arkansas. On the highway they spotted someone in need and pulled over to give him a ride. Little did they know the stranger was a wanted murderer. Will they suffer the same fate?

programme.title: House of Horrors: Kidnapped
programme.sub-title: A Madman Walks Into a Bar
programme.desc: When a crazed gunman storms into an East Village bar, Ann-Margret Gidley and her friends scramble for a way to escape. Trapped in a back room with no way out, Ann-Margret must summon a strength she didn't know she had to take down the shooter.

programme.title: House of Horrors: Kidnapped
programme.desc: When two young girls are coerced into a stranger's vehicle their lives will never be the same. In order to save their families the girls are forced to do unspeakable things until fate saves one of them while the other's life hangs in the balance.

programme.title: Homicide Hunter: Lt. Joe Kenda
programme.desc: A man rushes his friend to the hospital with serious gunshot wounds, reporting they were robbed by strangers. When the facts don't add up, Lt. Joe Kenda and his team go on the hunt for a secret eyewitness they've heard could crack the case wide open.

programme.title: Deadly Women
programme.desc: Apart, a woman and a man can be innocent, safe to society. But when some couples unite, they spark a terrible urge for destruction. Happy couples become deadly teams, intent on one goal--murder.

programme.title: Your Worst Nightmare
programme.desc: After a college graduate goes missing from her parents' home, investigators must rely on quick thinking and cunning police work, as they race against the clock to find her before it's too late.

programme.title: Your Worst Nightmare
programme.desc: After a failed relationship, 22-year-old Jennifer Hitchcock thinks she may have finally found that special someone when she meets Maurice Mason. But as soon as Maurice moves in, she can't help but feel as though someone is watching her every move.

programme.title: Your Worst Nightmare
programme.desc: 20-year-old Audrey Mabrey is sure she has found Mr. Right when she connects with NYPD Detective Chris Hanney. But as the couple prepares for a life down in Florida, skeletons from their life in New York start to surface.

programme.title: Blood Relatives
programme.desc: The Allman sisters have deep roots in their tight-knit Oakland community. When drug dealers threaten the neighbourhood, the family decides to stand their ground. But after their house goes up in flames, one family member hides a smouldering secret.

programme.title: Blood Relatives
programme.desc: The Byrom family of Luka, Mississippi, seem to have it all: love, success, and plenty of Southern charm. But they also have some very dark secrets. And soon, a penchant for sordid sex and a passion for poison will result in murder.

programme.title: Blood Relatives
programme.desc: For the DeWilds of Edgewater, CO, family always comes first. But when one DeWild threatens to break that bond, they find the only way out of this family is murder.

programme.title: House of Horrors: Kidnapped
programme.desc: Natasha Herzig thinks she's landed the job of her dreams. Instead, she's been lured into a prostitution ring led by a violent pimp. After enduring a year as a sex slave, Natasha makes a daring move that risks her life but ends in freedom.

programme.title: House of Horrors: Kidnapped
programme.desc: Brandi Baggett's relationship with her boyfriend quickly turns from a fairytale love story into an inescapable nightmare. Paul kidnaps Brandi and holds her at a farmhouse; it looks like she'll never get away, until she manipulates her way to freedom.

programme.title: House of Horrors: Kidnapped
programme.desc: An innocent night out turns disastrous for Amy Hall when she is introduced to a handsome new guy in town named 'Tex.' But once the two end up alone he shows his true colors. Tex abducts Amy, rapes her, and almost kills her before she can escape.

programme.title: House of Horrors: Kidnapped
programme.desc: Rosalie Williams is small but tough. She has to be, working as a sheriff's dispatcher and jailer. But she still feels uneasy when murderer and rapist Jerry McFadden lands in her care and knocks out a deputy and takes her hostage.

programme.title: House of Horrors: Kidnapped
programme.desc: Diabetic Karen Maffucci couldn't have lived in a safer neighborhood. She doesn't think twice about being alone while her kids and husband are away. But that all changes when a man breaks into her home and kidnaps her at gunpoint without her insulin.

programme.title: House of Horrors: Kidnapped
programme.desc: When three men abduct graduate student Ana Elizondo near the Mexican border, she thinks it's run of the mill border violence. But when Ana's captors inform her that her father owes them money, everything she thought she knew about him is questioned.

programme.title: House of Horrors: Kidnapped
programme.desc: Michael Marshall is one of 26 kids that have been kidnapped by delusional thrill seekers. After being held in a buried truck for over a day, it looks like they will never see the light of day again. But Michael Marshall refuses to say "die.".

programme.title: House of Horrors: Kidnapped
programme.desc: When Laura Cowan's husband is sent to jail she has nowhere to turn. So when Musa Muhammad offers to help she thinks that her prayers have been answered. As time goes by, she realizes his motives are questionable but by then she is his prisoner.

programme.desc: When a man bursts into nurse Margie Wyler's maternity ward, screaming and threatening members of the staff, she knows her first priority is the safety of her patients. What she doesn't realize is just how dangerous this man is.

programme.desc: Ian and Amber invested in a property nestled on a sprawling woodland, hoping to turn it into their first family home. This fixer upper has plenty of rustic charm, but Kortney and Dave will have to manage a massive renovation project.

programme.title: Making It Home With Kortney and Dave
programme.desc: Brenna and Shaun had big dreams for their house when they bought it four years ago, but none of their DIY projects have turned out according to plan.

programme.title: Making It Home With Kortney and Dave

programme.title: Making It Home With Kortney and Dave

programme.title: Making It Home With Kortney and Dave
programme.desc: Ted and Shannon bought their brick bungalow sight unseen but now all they can see are its flaws. Kortney and Dave will have to open up the house and make some bold design choices before they can rebuild it into a functional home for this family of four.

programme.title: Pool Kings
programme.desc: Mike Baldasare and Jim Bellamy, two best friends that build award winning pools for clients all across the southwest, head to Las Vegas to build a dream pool for Shane and Willow Jager's brand new dream home.

programme.title: Pool Kings
programme.desc: Mike and Jim have their work cut out for them when a Palm Springs couple wants to transform their narrow three-sided backyard into a personal resort by adding a grotto, zen area, putting green, oversized spa, and beach entry.

programme.title: Pool Kings
programme.desc: A young family from Carlsbad, California wants a nice backyard where the kids can play. Mike and Jim are up for the challenge and build a power-packed pool with a spa, underwater volcano, custom slide and a Tuscan grotto.

programme.title: Pool Kings
programme.desc: Now that the interior of their dream house is finished, a family of five asks the Pool Kings to transform their neglected backyard. They want a relaxing multi-level private resort with a waterfall grotto, huge spa, swim-up bar and outdoor living room.

programme.title: Pool Kings
programme.desc: A young family in a new house is hoping for some help upgrading their backyard in the form of a top-notch swimming pool. The pool of their dreams has a waterfall, a customized spa and a fire feature that accentuates their beautiful Texas view.

programme.title: Pool Kings
programme.desc: A young family wants to build a 'refined rustic' staycation paradise in their Austin, Texas backyard. Mike and Jim answer the call by building their dream oasis with waterfalls, LED lights, a swim-up bar and a barbecue cabana as the finishing touch.

programme.title: Pool Kings
programme.sub-title: My Last Pool Was An Iron Tub
programme.desc: A ranch family in Palm Desert, CA, is finally ready to build the desert oasis they've been dreaming of for 20 years. Their backyard paradise includes a complex of waterfalls, a natural boulder spillway, a hidden waterslide, and outdoor kitchen.

programme.title: Pool Kings
programme.desc: A big family on a large property wants to replace their old patio and pool with an updated design. Mike and Jim deliver on the dream by transforming the yard into a canyon country playground. The backyard oasis includes a lazy river and a cave.

programme.title: Pool Kings
programme.desc: After moving into a lovely Santa Barbara home, that once belonged to a master gardener, this family with little interest in gardening decides to get help. Mike and Jim turn a garden path into a swimming lane, and the flowerbed into a stylish pool house.

programme.title: Pool Kings
programme.desc: The Pool Kings head to Austin, Texas to build a pool alongside a golf course. The guys have their work cut out for them as they work to create a feature-filled pool that works in all seasons, provides privacy from golfers and matches the new patio.

programme.title: Pool Kings
programme.desc: The Pool Kings head to Corona, California, to help a big extended family that's running low on living space. They design a clean, geometrical pool with an artistic fountain wall, fire features and a killer barbecue area for everyone to enjoy.

programme.title: Pool Kings
programme.desc: The Kings take on their most spectacular project to date when a young family asks them to build the perfect pool for their dream home overlooking the mountains outside Ogden, Utah. They want the works including a 50 ft. long, 12 ft. deep pool.

programme.title: Pool Kings
programme.desc: A young family recently relocated to College Grove, TN and they desperately miss having a pool to enjoy. With a major elevation issue in their new backyard, Kyle and his team have a challenging build to tackle.

programme.title: Pool Kings
programme.desc: An active Florida family recently traded in the tropical life for the cool countryside in Auburntown, Tennessee.

programme.title: Pool Kings
programme.desc: A North Carolina family is eager to finally have their first pool. Their expansive backyard allows for an over-the-top, resort-style pool, so the crew take on an extensive build with a 30-foot waterfall, lazy river and a sunken fire pit island.

programme.title: American Monster
programme.desc: When a good-looking, successful businessman meets an aspiring actress, she appears to be the perfect match. But the honeymoon doesn't last long. The relationship takes a turn...a deadly turn.

programme.title: Evil Lives Here
programme.desc: Jeanne Avsenew and her young son Peter were close, but as Peter matured, his obsession with death grew. The day Jeanne finds a bullet with her name scrawled on it, she realizes her son wants her dead, and Jeanne must take drastic measures to keep safe.

programme.title: Signs of a Psychopath
programme.sub-title: I'm Not the Monster I Was
programme.desc: An unapologetic 14-year-old boy confesses to the murder of his best friend. Twelve years later, he's back in court with chance at a reduced sentence.

programme.title: Signs of a Psychopath
programme.desc: A charming 20-year-old wants to help authorities with a murder investigation. He claims to have met one of the three victims and says he has no knowledge of the crime, but detectives suspect otherwise.

programme.title: The Murder Tapes
programme.desc: Kiana Marshall, her brother Corey, and their friend Alexis are murdered. Now, bodycam and CCTV capture the hunt for their insane killer. Twisted tales lead detectives on a wild goose chase, but the killers are revealed and must face the consequences.

programme.title: American Monster
programme.desc: In the summer of 2014, a peaceful community in Hartford, WI is shaken to its core when a local teenager is found dead, the victim of a brutal murder, and the second victim in two days. The community must recognize that a killer lives among them.

programme.title: American Monster
programme.desc: A monster stalks the summer streets of Phoenix in 2005. With never-before-seen footage, we get a glimpse into the killer's life and how he's able to hide in plain sight. Can police catch him before he strikes again?

programme.title: American Monster
programme.desc: When a good-looking, successful businessman meets an aspiring actress, she appears to be the perfect match. But the honeymoon doesn't last long. The relationship takes a turn...a deadly turn.

programme.title: People Magazine Investigates
programme.desc: A quiet rural town is rocked when two middle-school girls go on a hike and are later found murdered. But when police discover one of the girls may have recorded her killer with her cellphone, the race is on to find the mysterious man.

programme.title: People Magazine Investigates
programme.desc: A college student working as a radio station intern far from home is murdered, launching a long and frustrating investigation that leaves family and police on the brink of hopelessness until forensic genealogy leads to a man on the run for decades.

programme.title: People Magazine Investigates
programme.desc: A woman is murdered the same night she's supposed to go out with rising star, Ashton Kutcher. Police believe the clues point to a serial killer.

programme.title: Evil Lives Here
programme.desc: Jamie Clark had already been twice unlucky in love, so when she met Anthony Lord she thought the third time would be the charm. But by the time she realized what perverted plans he had for her, she was already trapped.

programme.title: Evil Lives Here
programme.desc: When Lori McLeod fell for a man claiming to be an FBI agent, she felt certain that she would always be safe. Now, as the end of her life draws near, Lori is determined to ensure that the murderer who betrayed her family never becomes a free man.

programme.title: Evil Lives Here
programme.desc: When Robin Doll was rescued from her mother's violence and went to live with her father, she thought she had cheated death. She had no way of knowing that the man she looked to as her savior was hiding something even worse.

programme.title: Web of Lies
programme.desc: When a single mom finds her dream man online, she can't believe her luck. But her quest to meet him soon turns into every mother's worst nightmare. As police scramble to avert tragedy, they discover the most elaborate web of lies they've ever seen.

programme.title: Web of Lies
programme.desc: After a teenage house party spirals out of control, a shocking photo goes viral around the local schools. A vicious campaign of cyber bullying ensues that drives an innocent girl to take desperate action.

programme.title: Web of Lies
programme.desc: When a young mother of three plummets into depression, she turns to the internet to find comfort. What she discovers is a virtual world of fetishes and fantasies, where seemingly helpful hands hide the darkest of intentions.

programme.title: House of Horrors: Kidnapped
programme.desc: Kristen Baumer moves into her freshman dorm not far from home in Newark, DE. As the year comes to an end, she goes to a party with her girlfriends. Fun quickly turns to terror when her innocence is stolen by a man who haunts her until senior year.

programme.title: House of Horrors: Kidnapped
programme.desc: Newly engaged Nikki Ansley starts work at a convenient store to purchase her fiancé's wedding ring. On her first day, two masked gunmen enter the store and kidnap her and two of her friends. After a night of terror, Nikki's life is changed forever.

programme.title: House of Horrors: Kidnapped
programme.desc: Teka Adams was starting to turn her life around. She's thrilled when, at 9 months pregnant, she gets a call from a woman claiming to be a caseworker offering baby supplies. But Teka soon learns that the woman has something much more horrifying in mind.

programme.title: House of Horrors: Kidnapped
programme.desc: When successful Miami businessman Marc Schiller is ambushed by a gang of thugs in broad daylight, his nightmare is just beginning. Blindfolded and bound, Marc learns that the men hell-bent on killing him have a special kind of torture in store for him.

programme.title: House of Horrors: Kidnapped
programme.desc: Alicia Kozakiewicz was a typical 13-year old who made friends in chat rooms. But when she agreed to meet Scott Tyree in person, she had no idea he was a 38-year-old sadistic pedophile.

programme.title: House of Horrors: Kidnapped
programme.desc: Cynthia Vigil is a street-smart teen from Albuquerque… But a fateful meeting ends with Cynthia in chains and forced into the horrifying world of the Toy Box Killer – a madman who, along with his girlfriend, subjects Cynthia to a world of torture and fear.

programme.title: House of Horrors: Kidnapped
programme.desc: Peter Brandt could never have predicted the dark secrets he would uncover when he invited a brilliant contractor into his home. After a vicious attack, Peter must manipulate the madman threatening his life into setting him free.

programme.title: House of Horrors: Kidnapped
programme.desc: When Karen Kummerer's jilted ex-boyfriend takes her hostage on a terrifying, multi-state road trip, there is little hope for rescuing her alive. But Karen has a daring plan in her back pocket to keep the cops hot on their trail.

programme.title: House of Horrors: Kidnapped
programme.desc: Best friends Brandi and Liz are two small town teens who were taught to help others in need. So when a young man asks them for a ride to his house, they decide to oblige. But they soon discover the man intends for this to ride to be their last.

programme.title: House of Horrors: Kidnapped
programme.desc: Sam and Suzzane Peebles were headed home after a long road trip in Arkansas. On the highway they spotted someone in need and pulled over to give him a ride. Little did they know the stranger was a wanted murderer. Will they suffer the same fate?

programme.sub-title: A Madman Walks Into a Bar
programme.desc: When a crazed gunman storms into an East Village bar, Ann-Margret Gidley and her friends scramble for a way to escape. Trapped in a back room with no way out, Ann-Margret must summon a strength she didn't know she had to take down the shooter.

programme.desc: When two young girls are coerced into a stranger's vehicle their lives will never be the same. In order to save their families the girls are forced to do unspeakable things until fate saves one of them while the other's life hangs in the balance.

programme.title: Deadly Women

programme.title: Your Worst Nightmare
programme.desc: After a failed relationship, 22-year-old Jennifer Hitchcock thinks she may have finally found that special someone when she meets Maurice Mason. But as soon as Maurice moves in, she can't help but feel as though someone is watching her every move.

programme.title: Your Worst Nightmare
programme.desc: 20-year-old Audrey Mabrey is sure she has found Mr. Right when she connects with NYPD Detective Chris Hanney. But as the couple prepares for a life down in Florida, skeletons from their life in New York start to surface.

programme.title: Blood Relatives
programme.desc: The Allman sisters have deep roots in their tight-knit Oakland community. When drug dealers threaten the neighbourhood, the family decides to stand their ground. But after their house goes up in flames, one family member hides a smouldering secret.

programme.title: Blood Relatives
programme.desc: The Byrom family of Luka, Mississippi, seem to have it all: love, success, and plenty of Southern charm. But they also have some very dark secrets. And soon, a penchant for sordid sex and a passion for poison will result in murder.

programme.title: Blood Relatives
programme.desc: For the DeWilds of Edgewater, CO, family always comes first. But when one DeWild threatens to break that bond, they find the only way out of this family is murder.

programme.desc: Natasha Herzig thinks she's landed the job of her dreams. Instead, she's been lured into a prostitution ring led by a violent pimp. After enduring a year as a sex slave, Natasha makes a daring move that risks her life but ends in freedom.

programme.title: House of Horrors: Kidnapped
programme.desc: Brandi Baggett's relationship with her boyfriend quickly turns from a fairytale love story into an inescapable nightmare. Paul kidnaps Brandi and holds her at a farmhouse; it looks like she'll never get away, until she manipulates her way to freedom.

programme.title: House of Horrors: Kidnapped
programme.desc: An innocent night out turns disastrous for Amy Hall when she is introduced to a handsome new guy in town named 'Tex.' But once the two end up alone he shows his true colors. Tex abducts Amy, rapes her, and almost kills her before she can escape.

programme.title: House of Horrors: Kidnapped
programme.desc: Rosalie Williams is small but tough. She has to be, working as a sheriff's dispatcher and jailer. But she still feels uneasy when murderer and rapist Jerry McFadden lands in her care and knocks out a deputy and takes her hostage.

programme.title: House of Horrors: Kidnapped
programme.desc: Diabetic Karen Maffucci couldn't have lived in a safer neighborhood. She doesn't think twice about being alone while her kids and husband are away. But that all changes when a man breaks into her home and kidnaps her at gunpoint without her insulin.

programme.title: House of Horrors: Kidnapped
programme.desc: When three men abduct graduate student Ana Elizondo near the Mexican border, she thinks it's run of the mill border violence. But when Ana's captors inform her that her father owes them money, everything she thought she knew about him is questioned.

programme.title: House of Horrors: Kidnapped
programme.desc: Michael Marshall is one of 26 kids that have been kidnapped by delusional thrill seekers. After being held in a buried truck for over a day, it looks like they will never see the light of day again. But Michael Marshall refuses to say "die.".

programme.title: House of Horrors: Kidnapped
programme.desc: When Laura Cowan's husband is sent to jail she has nowhere to turn. So when Musa Muhammad offers to help she thinks that her prayers have been answered. As time goes by, she realizes his motives are questionable but by then she is his prisoner.

programme.title: House of Horrors: Kidnapped
programme.desc: When a man bursts into nurse Margie Wyler's maternity ward, screaming and threatening members of the staff, she knows her first priority is the safety of her patients. What she doesn't realize is just how dangerous this man is.

programme.desc: An innocent night out turns disastrous for Amy Hall when she is introduced to a handsome new guy in town named 'Tex.' But once the two end up alone he shows his true colors. Tex abducts Amy, rapes her, and almost kills her before she can escape.

programme.title: House of Horrors: Kidnapped
programme.desc: Rosalie Williams is small but tough. She has to be, working as a sheriff's dispatcher and jailer. But she still feels uneasy when murderer and rapist Jerry McFadden lands in her care and knocks out a deputy and takes her hostage.

programme.title: House of Horrors: Kidnapped
programme.desc: Diabetic Karen Maffucci couldn't have lived in a safer neighborhood. She doesn't think twice about being alone while her kids and husband are away. But that all changes when a man breaks into her home and kidnaps her at gunpoint without her insulin.

programme.title: House of Horrors: Kidnapped
programme.desc: When three men abduct graduate student Ana Elizondo near the Mexican border, she thinks it's run of the mill border violence. But when Ana's captors inform her that her father owes them money, everything she thought she knew about him is questioned.

programme.title: House of Horrors: Kidnapped
programme.desc: Michael Marshall is one of 26 kids that have been kidnapped by delusional thrill seekers. After being held in a buried truck for over a day, it looks like they will never see the light of day again. But Michael Marshall refuses to say "die.".

programme.title: House of Horrors: Kidnapped
programme.desc: When Laura Cowan's husband is sent to jail she has nowhere to turn. So when Musa Muhammad offers to help she thinks that her prayers have been answered. As time goes by, she realizes his motives are questionable but by then she is his prisoner.

programme.title: House of Horrors: Kidnapped
programme.desc: When a man bursts into nurse Margie Wyler's maternity ward, screaming and threatening members of the staff, she knows her first priority is the safety of her patients. What she doesn't realize is just how dangerous this man is.

programme.title: House of Horrors: Kidnapped
programme.desc: Jodie Gaines is confused, but compliant when a police car flags her down on a Tennessee back country road. However, as a plain clothed officer tells her to step out of the car, she doesn't realize she is stepping into her worst nightmare.

programme.title: House of Horrors: Kidnapped

programme.desc: People recount their horrifying true stories about living side-by-side with sociopathic friends or family who go on to commit heinous crimes.

programme.title: 48 Hours on ID
programme.desc: A woman turns to a private eye for help tracking down a Russian whom she believes robbed and killed her mother.

programme.title: 48 Hours on ID
programme.desc: While serving in Iraq, U.S. Marine Col. Michael Stahlman is found with a fatal gunshot wound to his head; his death is ruled a suicide, but his wife still believes he was murdered.

programme.title: On the Case With Paula Zahn
programme.desc: A teenage couple out on a date are ambushed by a gun-wielding madman; the lone survivor's heartbreaking account may hold the key to bringing a cold-blooded killer to justice.

programme.title: On the Case With Paula Zahn
programme.desc: A 16-year-old girl disappears on her way to visit friends; as police retrace her last known movements, they uncover evidence she may have been kidnapped by an international human trafficking ring.

programme.title: On the Case With Paula Zahn
programme.desc: When a loving mother is found gunned down just steps from her front door, police in her small town are baffled; as the investigation unfolds their initial confusion will quickly boil over into outrage.

programme.title: The Lies That Bind
programme.desc: In 2014, a 911 call reports gunshots at the home of TV show host Scott Rogers; as detectives work to piece together the events that led up to what looks like a murder-suicide, they soon discover a trail of lies from England to Louisiana.

programme.title: The Lies That Bind
programme.desc: High school sweethearts Lisa and Jimmy Moore end their marriage, and Lisa goes missing three months later; fearing the worst, her family files a missing person report, but the police have no leads and no witnesses.

programme.title: Betrayed
programme.desc: Thirty-four-year-old Paige Birgfeld juggles four jobs, three children and two ex-husbands, but no one realizes she is also hiding a deep, dark secret that will eventually lead to a betrayal.

programme.title: Betrayed
programme.desc: Yelena Zakin's life is turned upside down by her husband's interest in his new secretary, then she goes missing.

programme.title: Betrayed
programme.desc: Rhonda Smith is a single woman who relies on the kindness of strangers at her new church, then one of them betrays her.

programme.title: Married With Secrets
programme.desc: In Dublin, a kindergarten teacher goes missing, and her family assumes depression over her mother's death has driven her to suicide, never suspecting the real reason involves bondage and sadomasochism.

programme.title: Married With Secrets
programme.desc: A serial rapist known as the Ether Man lurks in the shadows of Albuquerque, N.M., and victims cannot identify the masked attacker; while the offender expands his hunting grounds, officials work to stop him before he attacks again.

programme.title: Married With Secrets
programme.desc: When dozens of women vanish from the Sunshine State in the late '60s, the get filed as presumed runways; police discover the bodies of two missing teens, uncovering the sadistic work of a prolific serial killer.

programme.title: Murder Comes Home
programme.desc: Lila Warwick is a loving and hands-on grandmother of eight whose door is always open for holidays, birthdays or for anyone in need of a helping hand.

programme.title: Murder Comes Home
programme.desc: When Marlys Sather doesn't return to work after a lunch appointment, her family makes a horrifying discovery; someone set fire to this loving mother of three.

programme.title: Murder Comes Home
programme.desc: Police find the body of young woman, Erika Megan Sharpton in her car, a red 1995 Ford Mustang.

programme.title: Murder Comes Home
programme.desc: When Paula Cardwell returns from running errands, she finds her 20-year-old daughter, Anna Catherine, lying dead on the kitchen floor; the small town of Wetumpka, Ala., is left stunned and determined to find the devil in its midst.

programme.title: Detective Diaries
programme.sub-title: The Phantom of La Palma - Part One
programme.desc: In La Palma, Calif., veteran cop Jim Engen and rookie detective Paul Bracciodieta set out to solve the 1974 cold case murder of Annie Ross (New!).

programme.title: Detective Diaries
programme.sub-title: The Phantom of La Palma - Part Two
programme.desc: In La Palma, Calif., veteran cop Jim Engen and rookie detective Paul Bracciodieta set out to solve the 1974 cold case murder of Annie Ross (New!).

programme.title: Fear Thy Neighbor
programme.desc: A former police chief gets into constant conflicts with a young renter who doesn't respect his authority; the war between them intensifies until blood flows down their street.

programme.title: Detective Diaries
programme.sub-title: The Phantom of La Palma - Part One
programme.desc: In La Palma, Calif., veteran cop Jim Engen and rookie detective Paul Bracciodieta set out to solve the 1974 cold case murder of Annie Ross (New!).

programme.title: Detective Diaries
programme.sub-title: The Phantom of La Palma - Part Two
programme.desc: In La Palma, Calif., veteran cop Jim Engen and rookie detective Paul Bracciodieta set out to solve the 1974 cold case murder of Annie Ross (New!).

programme.title: Apollo 13
programme.desc: This Hollywood drama is based on the events of the Apollo 13 lunar mission, astronauts Jim Lovell (Tom Hanks), Fred Haise (Bill Paxton) and Jack Swigert (Kevin Bacon) find everything going according to plan after leaving Earth's orbit. However, when an oxygen tank explodes, the scheduled moon landing is called off. Subsequent tensions within the crew and numerous technical problems threaten both the astronauts' survival and their safe return to Earth.

programme.title: Con Air
programme.desc: Just-paroled army ranger Cameron Poe (Nicolas Cage) is headed back to his wife (Monica Potter), but must fly home aboard a prison transport flight dubbed "Jailbird" with some of the worst criminals living. Along with Diamond Dog (Ving Rhames) and Baby-O (Mykelti Williamson), genius serial killer Cyrus "The Virus" Grissom (John Malkovich) unleashes a violent escape plot in mid-flight. Secretly working with U.S. Marshall Vince Larkin (John Cusack), Poe tries to foil Grissom's plan.

programme.title: The Circus: Inside the Greatest Political Show on Earth
programme.desc: Covering the battle over President Biden's agenda at Capitol Hill; Democrats at odds over infrastructure and social spending bills; John Heilemann goes behind the scenes with Rep. Josh Gottheimer; Alex Wagner speaks with Rep. Pramila Jayapal.

programme.title: Road House
programme.desc: The Double Deuce is the meanest, loudest and rowdiest bar south of the Mason-Dixon Line, and Dalton (Patrick Swayze) has been hired to clean it up. He might not look like much, but the Ph.D.-educated bouncer proves he's more than capable -- busting the heads of troublemakers and turning the roadhouse into a jumping hot-spot. But Dalton's romance with the gorgeous Dr. Clay (Kelly Lynch) puts him on the bad side of cutthroat local big shot Brad Wesley (Ben Gazzara).

programme.title: Point Break
programme.desc: After a string of bizarre bank robberies in Southern California, with the crooks donning masks of various former presidents, a federal agent, Johnny Utah (Keanu Reeves), infiltrates the suspected gang. But this is no ordinary group of robbers. They're surfers -- led by the charismatic Bodhi (Patrick Swayze) -- who are addicted to the rush of thievery. But when Utah falls in love with a female surfer, Tyler (Lori Petty), who is close to the gang, it complicates his sense of duty.

programme.title: Apollo 13
programme.desc: This Hollywood drama is based on the events of the Apollo 13 lunar mission, astronauts Jim Lovell (Tom Hanks), Fred Haise (Bill Paxton) and Jack Swigert (Kevin Bacon) find everything going according to plan after leaving Earth's orbit. However, when an oxygen tank explodes, the scheduled moon landing is called off. Subsequent tensions within the crew and numerous technical problems threaten both the astronauts' survival and their safe return to Earth.

programme.title: Boogie Nights
programme.desc: In the San Fernando Valley in 1977, teenage busboy Eddie Adams (Mark Wahlberg) gets discovered by porn director Jack Horner (Burt Reynolds), who transforms him into adult-film sensation Dirk Diggler. Brought into a supportive circle of friends, including fellow actors Amber Waves (Julianne Moore), Rollergirl (Heather Graham) and Reed Rothchild (John C. Reilly), Dirk fulfills all his ambitions, but a toxic combination of drugs and egotism threatens to take him back down.

programme.title: Scarface
programme.desc: After getting a green card in exchange for assassinating a Cuban government official, Tony Montana (Al Pacino) stakes a claim on the drug trade in Miami. Viciously murdering anyone who stands in his way, Tony eventually becomes the biggest drug lord in the state, controlling nearly all the cocaine that comes through Miami. But increased pressure from the police, wars with Colombian drug cartels and his own drug-fueled paranoia serve to fuel the flames of his eventual downfall.

programme.title: The General's Daughter
programme.desc: When the body of Army Capt. Elizabeth Campbell (Leslie Stefanson) is found on a Georgia military base, two investigators, Warrant Officers Paul Brenner (John Travolta) and Sara Sunhill (Madeleine Stowe), are ordered to solve her murder. What they uncover is anything but clear-cut. Unseemly details emerge about Campbell's life, leading to allegations of a possible military coverup of her death and the involvement of her father, Lt. Gen. Joseph Campbell (James Cromwell).

programme.title: Phenomenon
programme.desc: On his birthday, mechanic George Malley (John Travolta) sees a flash of light and proceeds to exhibit extraordinary mental abilities. He becomes a genius, even showing an ability to move objects with his mind. George wishes to help people, but the government wants to take him in for observation. Soon, George finds out from Dr. Brunder (Robert Duvall) that he has a massive brain tumor. With this new knowledge, George decides to spend his time with girlfriend Lace (Kyra Sedgwick).

programme.title: Vertigo
programme.desc: Hitchcock's romantic story of obsession, manipulation and fear. A detective is forced to retire after his fear of heights causes the death of a fellow officer and the girl he was hired to follow. He sees a double of the girl, causing him to transform her image onto the dead girl's body. This leads into a cycle of madness and lies.

programme.title: Come Play
programme.desc: Parents fight to save their son when a mysterious creature uses his electronic devices to break into our world.

programme.title: The Rock
programme.desc: FBI chemical warfare expert Stanley Goodspeed (Nicolas Cage) is sent on an urgent mission with a former British spy, John Patrick Mason (Sean Connery), to stop Gen. Francis X. Hummel (Ed Harris) from launching chemical weapons on Alcatraz Island into San Francisco. Gen. Hummel demands $100 million in war reparations to be paid to the families of slain servicemen who died on covert operations. After their SEAL team is wiped out, Stanley and John deal with the soldiers on their own.

programme.title: Out of Sight
programme.desc: Meet Jack Foley (George Clooney), the most successful bank robber in the country. On the day he busts out of jail, he finds himself stealing something far more precious than money ... Karen Sisco's (Jennifer Lopez) heart. She's smart. She's sexy, and unfortunately for Jack, she's a Federal Marshal. Now, they're willing to risk it all to find out if there's more between them than just the law.

programme.title: The Mauritanian
programme.desc: A defense attorney, her associate and a military prosecutor uncover a far-reaching conspiracy while investigating the case of a suspected 9/11 terrorist imprisoned at Guantanamo Bay, Cuba, for six years.

programme.title: Munich
programme.desc: After the murder of 11 Israeli athletes and their coach at the 1972 Olympics, the Israeli government secretly assigns Avner Kaufman (Eric Bana) to carry out a series of strategic retaliations. With the help of a driver (Daniel Craig), a forger (Hanns Zischler), a bomb-maker (Mathieu Kassovitz) and a former soldier (Ciarán Hinds), Avner conducts a worldwide operation, targeting 11 individuals. As the assassinations pile up, Avner begins to doubt the morality of his actions.

programme.title: Schindler's List
programme.desc: Businessman Oskar Schindler (Liam Neeson) arrives in Krakow in 1939, ready to make his fortune from World War II, which has just started. After joining the Nazi party primarily for political expediency, he staffs his factory with Jewish workers for similarly pragmatic reasons. When the SS begins exterminating Jews in the Krakow ghetto, Schindler arranges to have his workers protected to keep his factory in operation, but soon realizes that in so doing, he is also saving innocent lives.

programme.title: The Devil's Advocate
programme.desc: Aspiring Florida defense lawyer Kevin Lomax (Keanu Reeves) accepts a high-powered position at a New York law firm headed by legal shark John Milton (Al Pacino). As Kevin moves up in the firm's ranks, his wife, Mary Ann (Charlize Theron), has several frightening, mystical experiences that begin to warp her sense of reality. With the stakes getting higher with each case, Kevin quickly learns that his mentor is planning a far greater evil than simply winning without scruples.

programme.title: Dangerous Liaisons
programme.desc: The Marquise de Merteuil (Glenn Close) and the Vicomte de Valmont (John Malkovich) display the petty jealousies and jaded insouciance of life in France's royal court in the 18th century, casually ruining the lives of de Merteuil's young romantic rival (Uma Thurman), the music teacher (Keanu Reeves) for whom she secretly pines and the upstanding Madame de Tourvel (Michelle Pfeiffer). But when actual romantic feelings begin to surface, their games take on a more treacherous air.

programme.title: Come Play
programme.desc: Parents fight to save their son when a mysterious creature uses his electronic devices to break into our world.

programme.title: Countdown
programme.desc: When a young nurse downloads an app that claims to predict when a person is going to die, it tells her she has only three days to live. With time ticking away and death closing in, she must find a way to save her life before time runs out.

programme.title: Drag Me to Hell
programme.desc: Christine Brown (Alison Lohman) has a loving boyfriend (Justin Long) and a great job at a Los Angeles bank. But her heavenly life becomes hellish when, in an effort to impress her boss, she denies an old woman's request for an extension on her home loan. In retaliation, the crone places a curse on Christine, threatening her soul with eternal damnation. Christine seeks a psychic's help to break the curse, but the price to save her soul may be more than she can pay.

programme.title: North Hollywood
programme.desc: A kid must decide between choosing the future his father wants and following his dream of becoming a pro skater.

programme.title: Demolition Man
programme.desc: With innocent victims caught in the crossfire in Los Angeles' intensifying war on crime, both cop John Spartan (Sylvester Stallone) and violent thug Simon Phoenix (Wesley Snipes) are sentenced to a state of frozen incarceration known as "CryoPrison." When Spartan is finally thawed 36 years later, it's 2032, and Los Angeles is now a pacifist utopia called San Angeles. But with Phoenix again on the loose, Spartan must team up with future cop Lenina (Sandra Bullock) to apprehend the killer.

programme.title: Blown Away
programme.desc: After staging a particularly gory jailbreak, Irish Republican Army agent Ryan Gaerity (Tommy Lee Jones) makes his way to Boston and begins systematically picking off members of the police bomb squad. The leader of this team, Jimmy Dove (Jeff Bridges), is set to retire, but the recent spate of bombings lead him to stay on in an attempt to save as many of his men as possible. It isn't long before he discovers the culprit is his old colleague Gaerity, seeking revenge from their shared past.

programme.title: Carlito's Way
programme.desc: A free man after years in prison, Carlito Brigante (Al Pacino) intends to give up his criminal ways, but it's not long before the ex-con is sucked back into the New York City underworld. Reconnecting with his dancer girlfriend, Gail (Penelope Ann Miller), Carlito gets entangled in the shady dealings of his friend Dave Kleinfeld (Sean Penn), who also serves as his lawyer. When Carlito and Kleinfeld run afoul of shifty gangster Benny Blanco (John Alberto Leguizamo), it sets them on a dangerous path.

programme.title: Carlito's Way: Rise to Power
programme.desc: After serving time together in prison, three gangsters from different backgrounds -- Carlito (Jay Hernandez), Earl (Mario Van Peebles) and Rocco (Michael Kelly) -- join forces and take over the lucrative heroin trade in Harlem, N.Y. However, their partnership with a gangster (Burt Young) is threatened when Earl's hotheaded little brother, Reggie (Mtume Gant), disrespects the mobster's son and then kidnaps him. A ransom goes out on Reggie's head, and the friends are forced to choose sides.

programme.title: Mid90s
programme.desc: In 1990s Los Angeles, a 13-year-old spends his summer navigating between a troubled home life and a crew of new friends he meets at a skate shop.

programme.title: North Hollywood
programme.desc: A kid must decide between choosing the future his father wants and following his dream of becoming a pro skater.

programme.title: Waves
programme.desc: The epic emotional journey of a suburban African American family as they navigate love, forgiveness and coming together in the wake of a tragic loss.

programme.title: The L Word: Generation Q
programme.desc: Bette is forced to make a huge decision as the wedding quickly approaches; Shane and Tess reach a crossroads in their relationship; the release of Alice's book has a ripple effect (New!).

programme.title: Nine to Five
programme.desc: Office satire about three female secretaries who decide to get revenge on their tyrannical, sexist boss by abducting him and running the business themselves. The trio, one of whom has been passed over for promotion because she is a woman, spend a night together having drug-induced fantasies of killing the slave-driving chauvinist. One of them panics the following day when she suspects she really has poisoned the tyrant.

programme.title: Battle of the Sexes
programme.desc: The 1973 tennis match between Billie Jean King and Bobby Riggs became the most watched televised sports event of all time. Trapped in the media glare, King and Riggs were on opposites sides of a binary argument, but off-court each was fighting more personal and complex battles. With her husband urging her to fight for equal pay, the private King was also struggling to come to terms with her own sexuality, while Riggs gambled his legacy and reputation in a bid to relive the glories of his past.

programme.title: Fantastic Four
programme.desc: Transported to an alternate universe, four young outsiders gain superhuman powers as they alter their physical form in shocking ways. Reed Richards becomes Mr. Fantastic, able to stretch and twist his body at will, while pal Ben Grimm gains immense strength as the Thing. Johnny Storm becomes the Human Torch, able to control and project fire, while his sister Sue becomes the Invisible Woman. Together, the team must harness their new abilities to prevent Doctor Doom from destroying the Earth.

programme.title: Goosebumps
programme.desc: Upset about moving from the big city to a small town, young Zach Cooper (Dylan Minnette) finds a silver lining when he meets his beautiful neighbor Hannah (Odeya Rush). The teen is surprised to learn that Hannah's mysterious father is R.L. Stine (Jack Black), the famous author of the best-selling "Goosebumps" series. When Zach accidentally unleashes the monsters from the fantastic tales, it's up to Stine, his daughter and Cooper to return the beasts back to the books where they belong.

programme.title: Goosebumps 2: Haunted Halloween
programme.desc: While collecting junk one day, best friends Sonny and Sam meet Slappy, a mischievous talking dummy from an unpublished "Goosebumps" book by R.L. Stine. Hoping to start his own family, Slappy kidnaps Sonny's mother and brings all of his ghoulish friends back to life -- just in time for Halloween. As the sleepy town becomes overrun with monsters, witches and other mysterious creatures, Sonny joins forces with his sister, Sam and a kindly neighbor to save Sonny's mom and foil Slappy's plan.

programme.title: Goosebumps
programme.desc: Upset about moving from the big city to a small town, young Zach Cooper (Dylan Minnette) finds a silver lining when he meets his beautiful neighbor Hannah (Odeya Rush). The teen is surprised to learn that Hannah's mysterious father is R.L. Stine (Jack Black), the famous author of the best-selling "Goosebumps" series. When Zach accidentally unleashes the monsters from the fantastic tales, it's up to Stine, his daughter and Cooper to return the beasts back to the books where they belong.

programme.title: Goosebumps 2: Haunted Halloween
programme.desc: While collecting junk one day, best friends Sonny and Sam meet Slappy, a mischievous talking dummy from an unpublished "Goosebumps" book by R.L. Stine. Hoping to start his own family, Slappy kidnaps Sonny's mother and brings all of his ghoulish friends back to life -- just in time for Halloween. As the sleepy town becomes overrun with monsters, witches and other mysterious creatures, Sonny joins forces with his sister, Sam and a kindly neighbor to save Sonny's mom and foil Slappy's plan.

programme.title: Fantastic Four
programme.desc: Transported to an alternate universe, four young outsiders gain superhuman powers as they alter their physical form in shocking ways. Reed Richards becomes Mr. Fantastic, able to stretch and twist his body at will, while pal Ben Grimm gains immense strength as the Thing. Johnny Storm becomes the Human Torch, able to control and project fire, while his sister Sue becomes the Invisible Woman. Together, the team must harness their new abilities to prevent Doctor Doom from destroying the Earth.

programme.title: The Blair Witch Project
programme.desc: Found video footage tells the tale of three film students (Heather Donahue, Joshua Leonard, Michael C. Williams) who've traveled to a small town to collect documentary footage about the Blair Witch, a legendary local murderer. Over the course of several days, the students interview townspeople and gather clues to support the tale's veracity. But the project takes a frightening turn when the students lose their way in the woods and begin hearing horrific noises.

programme.title: Two for the Road
programme.desc: Architect Mark Wallace (Albert Finney) and his wife, Joanna (Audrey Hepburn), travel to France to meet with an affluent client (Claude Dauphin). While there, they reflect on their first decade of marriage -- memories of when they first met, of courtship and of road trips through the French countryside. As flirtation and playful quarreling turn to boredom with the banality of married life, the Wallaces struggle to rekindle their passion, while mutual infidelity threatens to tear them apart.

programme.title: Battle of the Sexes
programme.desc: The 1973 tennis match between Billie Jean King and Bobby Riggs became the most watched televised sports event of all time. Trapped in the media glare, King and Riggs were on opposites sides of a binary argument, but off-court each was fighting more personal and complex battles. With her husband urging her to fight for equal pay, the private King was also struggling to come to terms with her own sexuality, while Riggs gambled his legacy and reputation in a bid to relive the glories of his past.

programme.title: The Terrorists
programme.desc: Attempting to secure the release of political prisoners, a terrorist group, led by the fierce Ray Petrie (Ian McShane), takes over a British plane. Tough Scandinavian operative Nils Tahlvik (Sean Connery) is sent in to deal with the armed men and free the aircraft's passengers. Unfortunately for Tahlvik, the terrorists prove to be quite formidable. Meanwhile, another unit of the same extremist organization is holding an English ambassador hostage, which further complicates matters.

programme.title: Eyewitness
programme.desc: New York City custodian Daryll Deever (William Hurt) is a big fan of local news reporter Tony Sokolow (Sigourney Weaver), so he is intrigued when she shows up to cover a story at his workplace. There's been a murder in the office building, and Tony suspects that Daryll may have insight into the crime, a notion that he furthers to stay close to her. However, when those behind the killing begin to think that Daryll really knows something, they target both him and Tony to keep their secrets hidden.

programme.title: Warning Sign
programme.desc: Research scientists are turned into homicidal maniacs when a secret germ-warfare experiment goes haywire.

programme.title: Cocoon
programme.desc: Oscar-winning fantasy in which the residents of a Florida rest home get a new lease of life when they stumble across an alien "fountain of youth" in a disused holiday home. Unbeknown to them, aliens have been using the swimming pool in the house to store their cocooned brethren, giving the waters a powerful, rejuvenating quality.

programme.title: Alien: Covenant
programme.desc: Bound for a remote planet on the far side of the galaxy, members (Katherine Waterston, Billy Crudup) of the colony ship Covenant discover what they think to be an uncharted paradise. While there, they meet David (Michael Fassbender), the synthetic survivor of the doomed Prometheus expedition. The mysterious world soon turns dark and dangerous when a hostile alien life-form forces the crew into a deadly fight for survival.

programme.title: FXM Presents
programme.desc: An examination of the process of making movies follows a production from script to screen.

programme.title: Independence Day: Resurgence
programme.desc: As the Fourth of July nears, satellite engineer David Levinson (Jeff Goldblum) investigates a 3,000-mile-wide mother ship that's approaching Earth. Fortunately, 20 years earlier, nations across the world started to use recovered extraterrestrial technology to develop an immense defense program. When the alien invaders attack with unprecedented force, the U.S. president, teams of scientists and brave fighter pilots spring into action to save the planet from a seemingly invincible enemy.

programme.title: The Mummy
programme.desc: Nick Morton is a soldier of fortune who plunders ancient sites for timeless artifacts and sells them to the highest bidder. When Nick and his partner come under attack in the Middle East, the ensuing battle accidentally unearths Ahmanet, a betrayed Egyptian princess who was entombed under the desert for thousands of years. With her powers constantly evolving, Morton must now stop the resurrected monster as she embarks on a furious rampage through the streets of London.

programme.title: The Mummy
programme.desc: Nick Morton is a soldier of fortune who plunders ancient sites for timeless artifacts and sells them to the highest bidder. When Nick and his partner come under attack in the Middle East, the ensuing battle accidentally unearths Ahmanet, a betrayed Egyptian princess who was entombed under the desert for thousands of years. With her powers constantly evolving, Morton must now stop the resurrected monster as she embarks on a furious rampage through the streets of London.

programme.title: FXM Presents

programme.title: Alien: Covenant

While there, they meet David (Michael Fassbender), the synthetic survivor of the doomed Prometheus expedition. The mysterious world soon turns dark and dangerous when a hostile alien life-form forces the crew into a deadly fight for survival.

programme.title: FXM Presents
programme.desc: An examination of the process of making movies follows a production from script to screen.

programme.title: Warning Sign
programme.desc: Research scientists are turned into homicidal maniacs when a secret germ-warfare experiment goes haywire.

programme.title: The Day Mars Invaded Earth
programme.desc: A Cape Canaveral scientist (Kent Taylor) finds martians reducing people to ashes and taking their places.

programme.title: The Terrorists
programme.desc: Attempting to secure the release of political prisoners, a terrorist group, led by the fierce Ray Petrie (Ian McShane), takes over a British plane. Tough Scandinavian operative Nils Tahlvik (Sean Connery) is sent in to deal with the armed men and free the aircraft's passengers. Unfortunately for Tahlvik, the terrorists prove to be quite formidable. Meanwhile, another unit of the same extremist organization is holding an English ambassador hostage, which further complicates matters.

programme.title: Eyewitness
programme.desc: New York City custodian Daryll Deever (William Hurt) is a big fan of local news reporter Tony Sokolow (Sigourney Weaver), so he is intrigued when she shows up to cover a story at his workplace. There's been a murder in the office building, and Tony suspects that Daryll may have insight into the crime, a notion that he furthers to stay close to her. However, when those behind the killing begin to think that Daryll really knows something, they target both him and Tony to keep their secrets hidden.

programme.title: Voyage to the Bottom of the Sea
programme.desc: Harriman Nelson (Walter Pidgeon) is the creator of a revolutionary nuclear submarine. After testing its capabilities in the Arctic Ocean, Nelson and the commanding officer (Robert Sterling) surface the vessel, only to discover the sky ablaze. Learning that the Van Allen radiation belt has caught fire, Nelson conceives a plan that could save the planet from destruction, but the U.N. shoots it down. Nelson is convinced it will work, but an onboard psychiatrist (Joan Fontaine) questions his sanity.

programme.title: The Day Mars Invaded Earth
programme.desc: A Cape Canaveral scientist (Kent Taylor) finds martians reducing people to ashes and taking their places.

programme.title: The Earth Dies Screaming
programme.desc: An astronaut (Willard Parker) returns from a test flight to find England overtaken by alien-controlled robots which turn corpses into zombies.

programme.title: The Day the Earth Stood Still
programme.desc: When a UFO lands in Washington, D.C., bearing a message for Earth's leaders, all of humanity stands still. Klaatu (Michael Rennie) has come on behalf of alien life who have been watching Cold War-era nuclear proliferation on Earth. But it is Klaatu's soft-spoken robot Gort that presents a more immediate threat to onlookers. A single mother (Patricia Neal) and her son teach the world about peace and tolerance in this moral fable, ousting the tanks and soldiers that greet the alien's arrival.

programme.title: Independence Day: Resurgence
programme.desc: As the Fourth of July nears, satellite engineer David Levinson (Jeff Goldblum) investigates a 3,000-mile-wide mother ship that's approaching Earth. Fortunately, 20 years earlier, nations across the world started to use recovered extraterrestrial technology to develop an immense defense program. When the alien invaders attack with unprecedented force, the U.S. president, teams of scientists and brave fighter pilots spring into action to save the planet from a seemingly invincible enemy.

programme.title: Flatliners
programme.desc: Five medical students embark on a daring and dangerous experiment to gain insight into the mystery of what lies beyond the confines of life. The bold adventure begins when they trigger near-death experiences by stopping their hearts for short periods of time. As their trials become more perilous, each must confront the sins from their past while facing the paranormal consequences of journeying to the other side.

programme.title: A Quiet Place
programme.desc: If they hear you, they hunt you. A family must live in silence to avoid mysterious creatures that hunt by sound. Knowing that even the slightest whisper or footstep can bring death, Evelyn and Lee are determined to find a way to protect their children while desperately searching for a way to fight back.

programme.title: A Quiet Place
programme.desc: If they hear you, they hunt you. A family must live in silence to avoid mysterious creatures that hunt by sound. Knowing that even the slightest whisper or footstep can bring death, Evelyn and Lee are determined to find a way to protect their children while desperately searching for a way to fight back.

programme.title: The Intruder
programme.desc: Scott and Annie Russell couldn't be happier after buying their dream home from a mysterious and lonely widower named Charlie in Napa Valley, Calif. Their newfound paradise soon turns into a living nightmare when Charlie -- still strangely attached to the house -- begins to show up and interfere in their daily lives. When his erratic behavior turns to obsession, the young couple soon find themselves caught up in a violent confrontation that threatens to destroy everything they hold dear.

programme.title: The Intruder
programme.desc: Scott and Annie Russell couldn't be happier after buying their dream home from a mysterious and lonely widower named Charlie in Napa Valley, Calif. Their newfound paradise soon turns into a living nightmare when Charlie -- still strangely attached to the house -- begins to show up and interfere in their daily lives. When his erratic behavior turns to obsession, the young couple soon find themselves caught up in a violent confrontation that threatens to destroy everything they hold dear.

programme.title: Spiral: From the Book of Saw
programme.desc: Working in the shadow of his father, Detective Ezekiel "Zeke" Banks and his rookie partner take charge of an investigation into grisly murders that are eerily reminiscent of the city's gruesome past. Unwittingly entrapped in a deepening mystery, Zeke finds himself at the center of the killer's morbid game.

programme.title: The Broken Hearts Gallery
programme.desc: Dumped by her boyfriend, a New York art gallery assistant creates an exhibit for souvenirs from past relationships.

programme.title: The Break-Up
programme.desc: When Brooke (Jennifer Aniston), an art dealer, and Gary (Vince Vaughn), a tour-bus driver, finally call it quits in their relationship, neither is willing to move out of their shared condo. With their friends suggesting a series of underhanded tactics that fail to get either Brooke or Gary to cave in, the only solution is to become hostile roommates.

programme.title: Heels
programme.desc: The South Georgia State Fair is only a couple of weeks away, and Jack's doing all he can to keep his professional and personal lives intact; Staci has suspicions that Jack played a role in Ace's unexpected Heel-turn.

programme.title: BMF
programme.desc: Tensions rise between The 50 Boyz and their rivals, which creates repercussions; Lamar plants misinformation so he can actively step towards the throne.

programme.title: Spiral: From the Book of Saw
programme.desc: Working in the shadow of his father, Detective Ezekiel "Zeke" Banks and his rookie partner take charge of an investigation into grisly murders that are eerily reminiscent of the city's gruesome past. Unwittingly entrapped in a deepening mystery, Zeke finds himself at the center of the killer's morbid game.

programme.title: Captain Phillips
programme.desc: In April 2009, the U.S. containership Maersk Alabama sails toward its destination on a day that seems like any other. Suddenly, Somali pirates race toward the vessel, climb aboard and take everyone hostage. The captain of the ship, Richard Phillips (Tom Hanks), looks to protect his crew from the hostile invaders, and their leader, Muse (Barkhad Abdi). The pirates are after millions of dollars, and Phillips must use his wits to make sure everyone survives and returns home safely.

programme.title: Heels

programme.title: Liar Liar
programme.desc: Conniving attorney Fletcher Reede (Jim Carrey) is an ace in the courtroom, but his dishonesty and devotion to work ruin his relationships. His wife, Audrey (Maura Tierney), has left him for a more dependable man, and Fletcher often breaks the commitments he makes to his beloved son, Max (Justin Cooper). When Max wishes his dad would stop lying for 24 hours, Fletcher suddenly finds that he can only speak the truth -- on the day his career-deciding court case has to be won.

programme.title: The Unholy
programme.desc: A girl inexplicably gains the power to heal the sick after a supposed visitation from the Virgin Mary. As word spreads and people flock to witness her miracles, a disgraced journalist visits the small New England town to investigate. However, when strange events start to occur, he soon wonders if these phenomena are the result of something more sinister.

programme.title: Made of Honor
programme.desc: Always shy of commitment, Tom (Patrick Dempsey) lives as a serial dater. Hannah (Michelle Monaghan), his best friend, has wanted to marry and now has found Mr. Right -- just as Tom realizes he really loves Hannah. When she asks him to be in her bridal party, Tom seizes the opportunity to prevent the nuptials and woo her himself.

programme.title: Be Cool
programme.desc: Having made the transition from gangster to movie producer, Chili Palmer (John Travolta) is ready for the next big move. Setting his sights on the music industry, Palmer enters a precarious business that has more than just temperamental musicians: Russian mobsters, rival producers and hit men are out to bring him down. From witnessing the murder of his friend (James Woods) to romancing a music executive's widow (Uma Thurman), it seems as though it might all fall apart, but Palmer has his ways.
